nome: Fate/Grand Order: Himuro no Tenchi - 7-nin no Saikyou Ijin-hen

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Fate/Grand Order: Himuro no Tenchi - 7-nin no Saikyou Ijin-hen
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: Fate/Grand Order x Himuro's World: Seven Most Powerful Great Figures Chapter
metadata_completo.sinopse:
The source material follows three girls — Kaede Makidera, Kane Himuro, and Yukika Saegusa — at Homurahara Academy, but has nothing to do with the efforts to restore the Human Order.

(Source: ANN, edited)
